sys_ui_script.description: Injects AIAB Chat widget iframe on UI16 pages
sys_ui_script.name: AIAB Chat Injector

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_c76901ee836eb2104d4fccb6feaad355
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description>Injects AIAB Chat widget iframe on UI16 pages</description><global>true</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>AIAB Chat Injector</name><script><![CDATA[// AIAB Chat Injector - Injects chat widget on UI16 pages
(function() {
  console.log('AIAB Chat: Script loaded', window.location.pathname);
  
  // Only run in gsft_main frame (the content frame in UI16)
  if (window.name !== 'gsft_main') {
    return;
  }
  
  // Skip if already injected
  if (document.getElementById('aiab-chat-iframe')) {
    console.log('AIAB Chat: Already injected');
    return;
  }
  
  console.log('AIAB Chat: Injecting in gsft_main...');
  
  // Build iframe URL
  var iframeSrc = '/aiab?id=aiab_chat';
  
  // Add record context if on a form
  if (typeof g_form !== 'undefined' && g_form.getTableName && g_form.getUniqueValue) {
    var table = g_form.getTableName();
    var sysId = g_form.getUniqueValue();
    if (table && sysId) {
      iframeSrc += '&record_table=' + encodeURIComponent(table);
      iframeSrc += '&record_sys_id=' + encodeURIComponent(sysId);
      var display = '';
      try { display = g_form.getValue('number') || g_form.getValue('name') || ''; } catch(e) {}
      if (display) {
        iframeSrc += '&record_display=' + encodeURIComponent(display);
      }
      console.log('AIAB Chat: Record context:', table, sysId);
    }
  }
  
  console.log('AIAB Chat: Iframe URL:', iframeSrc);
  
  // Create and inject iframe
  var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
  iframe.id = 'aiab-chat-iframe';
  iframe.src = iframeSrc;
  iframe.style.cssText = 'position:fixed;bottom:0;right:0;width:420px;height:560px;border:none;z-index:10000;background:transparent;';
  iframe.setAttribute('allowtransparency', 'true');
  
  document.body.appendChild(iframe);
  console.log('AIAB Chat: Iframe injected!');
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-22 23:23:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>c76901ee836eb2104d4fccb6feaad355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIAB Chat Injector</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_c76901ee836eb2104d4fccb6feaad355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-22 23:27:47</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
